channel.title: Nagios on Chris Titus Tech | Technology Simplified
channel.description: Recent content in Nagios on Chris Titus Tech | Technology Simplified

item.title: Report Nvidia-smi Temperature to Nagios
item.description: Here is a custom script that reports the nvidia-smi temperature of the Nvidia cards in your system using NRPE. Conversely,  NRPE performs much better than NCPA and my protocol of choice.

item.title: Troubleshooting Nagios 4 Core Installation
item.description: Use the following command to verify you have all your config and command files correct when troubleshooting Nagios core installation. This will give you a readout of any configuration errors, thus giving you the ability to fix it on the fly.
